about.title: Decentralized Stability
about.description: Oracle Free Dollar (OFD) is a revolutionary stablecoin that maintains its peg to the US Dollar through a unique, decentralized mechanism. Our auction-based liquidation system ensures stability without relying on external price feeds, making OFD one of the most robust and trustless stablecoins in the market.
